content.text:
# Ministry of Culture and Sports (Uzbekistan)

| footnotes       =
| map             =
| map_width       =
| map_caption     =
}}
The Ministry of Culture and Sports of the Republic of Uzbekistan (; Uzbek Cyrillic: Ўзбекистон Республикаси маданият ва спорт ишлари вазирлиги) is a body of the Government of Uzbekistan that responsible for state policy in cultural spheres, Art, Cinematography, archives, inter-nations issues, and sports.
